summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeMAËLYS B-POISED Neck & Décolleté Firming Cream is proven to reduce the look of wrinkles in the neck and décolleté area for a younger appearance. It’s formulated with plant extract Brazilian Peppertree to smooth the look of skin and hydrating ingredients to give the youthful glow you’re after.
details: DetailsBenefitsHelps improve skin elasticity for a tight-looking neckSmooths the look of lines and wrinklesKey IngredientsFormulated without: Parabens, SLS, and Phthalates.Brazilian Peppertree: A plant extract that helps invigorate the skin and is proven to smooth the look of fatty skin.Kangaroo Flower: A botanical extract that helps tighten the appearance of neck wrinkles and sagging skin.Research ResultsClinically proven to smooth the look of wrinkles on the neck.Clinically proven to help improve skin elasticity for a tight-looking neck.*Based on a 56-day clinical trial with 31 participants.Item 2605437How To UseDab a moderate amount of the cream onto the area from the jaw down to the collarbone.Apply to the décolleté as desired. Massage into the skin in circular motions until fully absorbed.Use twice a day for best results.IngredientsWater (Aqua), Cetearyl Ethylhexanoate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glyceryl Stearate Citrate, Glycerin, Cetyl Alcohol, Stearyl Alcohol, Trifluoroacetyl Tripeptide-2, Panthenol, Zinc Oxide, Schinus Terebinthifolia Seed Extract, Polyacrylate Crosspolymer-6, Linoleic Acid, Xanthan Gum, Tocopheryl Acetate, PVP, Ascorbyl Tetraisopalmitate, Dipropylene Glycol, Anigozanthos Flavidus Extract, Caprylyl Glycol, Disodium EDTA, Dextran, Chlorphenesin, t-Butyl Alcohol, Citric Acid, Sorbic Acid, Sodium Chloride, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Sulfate, Fragrance (Parfum), Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Salicylate, Citronellol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool, Red 40 (CI 16035).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Dab a moderate amount of the cream onto the area from the jaw down to the collarbone.Apply to the décolleté as desired. Massage into the skin in circular motions until fully absorbed.Use twice a day for best results.

reviews.headline: Feel like its working
reviews.comments: Been using for a month now. I do feel like it works. Very hydrating and a nice scent as well.

reviews.headline: So impressed!
reviews.comments: I was looking for a product to tighten my neck. This product was recommended by the manager on the floor. I've been using it for 10 days and am so impressed! I started seeing results almost immediately. The scent is pleasant as well.

reviews.headline: Nice Neck Cream
reviews.comments: Very pleased with this cream.  Lightweight but absorbs really well. Good results so far.

reviews.headline: Do not waste your time or money
reviews.comments: It doesn't do a thing. I will admit I only do it once a day. But nothing has happened not even in the slightest. Moisturizing for sure but does nothing else.

reviews.headline: Don't waste your money or time on this product.
reviews.comments: Poised and all of the Maelys products I have tried do absolutely nothing that they claim they do. Maybe they moisturize at best. Very disappointing.

reviews.headline: First time trier
reviews.comments: My favorite thing about this product is the creaminess and the smell is to die for. I don't know if I've seen much change yet. But the fact that it smells so good is making me use it twice a day per their direction. I'm hopeful for good results!

reviews.headline: Descent product
reviews.comments: This is an "ok" product but the smell is overwhelming when applied. Skin care doesn't need that much fragrance. That why we wear a perfume of choice.

reviews.headline: Not Much of a Difference
reviews.comments: I couldn't notice a difference. The only thing I will say is that it's good to use some type of lotion or cream in neck area so this would be a decent one to use.

reviews.headline: Broke out in a RASH!
reviews.comments:
Used it once and broke out in a rash! 
B-poised & B -perky gave me a rash but i love GET DREAMY! I dont know why or what went wrong. So i wont be using this product again.

reviews.headline: Smells so awful, threw it out
reviews.comments: Gross cheap purfume smell. Gave me an instant headache. Disappointed.

reviews.headline: So far it's working!
reviews.comments: I've been using this product for about 1-2 weeks and was happy to see it working! My neck looks former and smoother. I recommend:)

reviews.headline: I would not purchase this product again
reviews.comments: It does not tighten anything

reviews.headline: Excelente
reviews.comments: I have been using this cream for almost 2 years. It most certainly works. It last a long time too. I use it every day only on my neck, tightness your skin. You will notice the difference in a week. Great product.

reviews.headline: Clean and Smooth
reviews.comments:
It is only my first night using Maely's procucts and I started with B-Poised. It feels tighter, no burning, but definitely a sensation of the skin being drawn tighter for lack of any other description. 

Of course I can't speak for long term use but fingers crossed I see the results im feeling.

reviews.headline: Saw zero change
reviews.comments: Ive been using this 2 times a day since i got it. That while time I missed 2 days. Its iver a month and zero change.

reviews.headline: It works!!!!
reviews.comments: Im in my second week and I do see some improvement on less visible cellulite on my legs.

reviews.headline: Surprisingly good
reviews.comments:
I had bought this on one of the beauty subscription sites at a deep discount and figured even though it's a brand I had not heard of, it might be good. I had been looking for a new throat cream. I was drawn to "firming" because I'm the other side of 60 and the skin of my neck is starting to lose elasticity.

I was pleasantly surprised. The cream is light, applies easily and has minimal fragrance. It can be a little sticky if you use too much, but overall it's a good product. 

I think the price is a little high, though.

reviews.headline: Way too fragrant
reviews.comments: I've only used this product a couple of times, so I can't speak to its effectiveness. What I can say is that the fragrance is wayyyyyy too strong. It's absolutely smothering, especially to be on the neck so close to the face. I can't handle it.

reviews.headline: This stuff works
reviews.comments: Plain and simple ! It works! And has a clean feeling ! This is a must have item !!!

reviews.headline: Only looks good
reviews.comments: Not visibie results

faceoff_positive.comments: Great so far! I ordered b-tight, thic, flat, poised and bright eye cream. I've only been using twice a day for one week and already seeing results. And I have deep wrinkles on my neck that have been there for at least 20+ years I never expected to see lighten or smooth out from any product. Especially not after only a week. The poised cream has helped with my little double chin as well (which has also just been there and my face shape my whole life and I'm a very active and healthy person. So it's been quite stubborn). I also have the worst dark circles in all of the land, let me tell you. Slathering on the bright cream at night has helped so much too. And the thic cream is helping lift and and slightly plump my nice little round booty, so thank you!! These products are the absolute best! Would highly recommend and have already raved about them to my mom and friends. These products actually do exactly what they say, and that is incredibly hard to find (I've tried just about every product under the sun, a bit of an obsession).
faceoff_positive.headline: Great so far! I ordered

faceoff_negative.comments: This neck cream is thick and moisturizing.  I also like the smell.  But I assure you, none of my friends are asking "Did you have work done!?"  And no, my husband isn't noticing anything either. That's because this does not firm anything. At all.  While the smell is lovely and it does a decent job of moisturizing, it does not work as advertised.  I would maybe buy it again because who doesn't like to be moisturized.  But if you are thinking this will save you from an impending neck lift, then No.  No it will not.
faceoff_negative.headline: Meh
